original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2386)@ 引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形菱紋氣盾，在接下來的$Status_duration(1516)@秒內減少80%物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2386)@ Yin Qi Condensation Shield, forming a spherical diamond-patterned air shield around the generals, which will decrease by 80 in the next $Status_duration(1516)@ seconds % Physical damage.
